title: need for muay thai lee sin :(
body:
Hi there riot games i really need 300 rp for a skin that i always wanted muay thai lee sin im currently playing on EUNE my nickname is Budak U Glavu so if you could sent me some rp i would really appreciate it :) Or maybe some of you guys that see this discussion could help me :) 
{{sticker:draven-pose}}

replies.body: We do love makin' the clubs rain with RP, but 300 is a little bit more than the RP poros could probably stand. They can typically only handle rp gifts in the double digits =\ .
